Method Detail

addMimeRecord

public void addMimeRecord(java.io.InputStream is,
                          java.lang.String mimetype)
                   throws java.io.IOException
Stores an NDEF record from an InputStream. Will throw an IOException if the last NDEF record is a checksum added with addChecksum().

Parameters:
is - InputStream that holds the payload data of the NDEF record.
mimetype - MIME type definition, e.g. "text/plain"
Throws:
java.io.IOException

addUriRecord

public void addUriRecord(java.lang.String uri)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Stores an NDEF record containing a URI, using the URI format definition.

Parameters:
uri - the URI to be written
Throws:
java.io.IOException

buildMessage

public NdefMessage buildMessage()
Builds an NdefMessage from all stored NDEF records.

Returns:
NdefMessage

addChecksum

public void addChecksum()
Creates a CRC32 checksum out of all previously added NDEF records and adds it as last record entry. After that, it will not be possible to add additional records. The record payload will be a String consisting of the prefix 'crc32:' and a String representation of the checksum long, e.g. 'crc32:2868450884'. The record will be MIME formatted as 'text/plain'.

getDataSize

public int getDataSize()
Returns:
the overall NdefMessage size.
